hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Biggoron Sword#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #the Spirit Temple Boss Key# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room
